content:
Hi all,

I'm reading the FHIR standard and I have the next question: Is it possible to apply this standar to transmit Health Record Data such as blood preassure, heart rate, etc., not only one measure but a large array of data from one device to any Health's software?

Does anyone can help me?

Thanks for advance.
Sure, you can put all individual measurements in one bundle, for example http://build.fhir.org/bundle
You can also look at using the SampledData data type, though there might be a conflict between using that and the mandated profiles for vital signs. I've raised GF#20735 to discuss this.
